column4: why does apt tell me packages are held back and i need to do a dist-upgrade to get them?   I thought dist-upgrade was meant to move to the next release?   ie:  when unstable is moved to stable ...
do-release-upgrade is used to move from one release to the next.  Not sure what dist-upgrade is for anymore...
ok thanks,  I am sane though,  thats what it used to be for?
According to the man page it is a more intense upgrade (I just use sudo aptitude safe-upgrade)
